text: The UK 🇬🇧 is playing a leading role in efforts to develop a #Covid vaccine and better testing. We're pleased to co-host the Coronavirus Global Response Summit on 4 May with our partners 🇪🇺🇫🇷🇩🇪🇳🇴🇯🇵🇸🇦🇿🇦 @BillGates @WellcomeTrust @CEPIvaccines @WHO, to develop a vaccine together.
